TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Isaias_Afwerki, title = Isaias_Afwerki, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isaias_Afwerki} }

S.FORM: Isaias Afwerki I 1946 a miheca saka 2 folad saka 2 a romi'ad masofoc ci Isaias Afwerki, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Eritrea anini i ci Isaias Afwerki, patirengan a romi'ad i 1993 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 24 a romi'ad.

Isaias Afwerki I 1946 a miheca saka 2 folad saka 2 a romi'ad masofoc ci Isaias Afwerki, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Eritrea anini i ci Isaias Afwerki, patirengan a romi'ad i 1993 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 24 a romi'ad.
